entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump President* you always shouted for violence in your rallies,

for mayhem, stealing refugee children from families,

and keeping them in COVID-19 petri confinement.

The disordered, crazy town chaos of your administration is legendary.

You lie. We die.

105,000

*impeached
